ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Tools for modelling, ML estimation, validation analysis and simulation of non homogeneous Poisson processes in time.
Tools for modelling, ML estimation, validation analysis and simulation of non homogeneous Poisson processes in time.

name: r-nhpoisson
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "3.4" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-nhpoisson
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/NHPoisson_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/NHPoisson/NHPoisson_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 35e7db2ddfea12bd076f15f14b8d799cecae3103082a9ae0be4d2312af51c23d

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-car
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-car

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('NHPoisson')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('NHPoisson')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=NHPoisson
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Tools for modelling, ML estimation, validation analysis and simulation of non homogeneous Poisson processes in time.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: NHPoisson
# Type: Package
# Title: Modelling and Validation of Non Homogeneous Poisson Processes
# Version: 3.3
# Date: 2020-02-18
# Author: Ana C. Cebrian <acebrian@unizar.es>
# Maintainer: Ana C. Cebrian <acebrian@unizar.es>
# Imports: parallel, car
# Depends: methods, stats4
# Description: Tools for modelling, ML estimation, validation analysis and simulation of non homogeneous Poisson processes in time.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2020-02-19 10:52:48 UTC; acebrian
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-02-19 11:50:02 UTC
